price: Então, o Mensageiro de Allah disse-lhes: "Deixai o camelo fêmea - vindo de Allah - e sua porção de bebida."
arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: faqāla lahum rasūlu al-lahi nāqata al-lahi wasuq'yāhā
